name: Otto Leinsdorf
overview:
Otto joined Crosslink in 2012 and focuses on mobile, content, and media investments.
Prior to joining Crosslink, Otto worked as an analyst for the Product Counsel group at YouTube where he worked on product risks associated with internationalization, the livestreaming platform, and content licensing transactions. Prior to YouTube, Otto worked as an associate in the Dedicated Clients Sector of Google's Online Sales Organization.  He is currently a member of the Founders' Board and an advisor to policymic.com.
